name: ALDO RAINE & NOUS ÉTIONS SPLIT 10" MLP
description:
This is #TLE 019 and it is a very very nice record. "Do-it-together" was the main thing that brought us all together and so this became a split between a canadian and a german band and with many nice labels like Maniyax, Don't live like me Records, Aqueous Records and Désertion Records (USA, Canada, France and Germany).
The covers are silkscreend by Benni from Black Ink on heavyweight eco-cardboard and look freaking amazing. The artwork is so detailed and perfect it makes me cring and its done by the amazing David Schiesser. The sound is superb and you will be amazed on the quality of this recording.

Both bands have released very good debuts in the first half of 2012 and now they put out a new four-song split. Aldo Raine combines screamo/hardcore with dreamy post-rock touch from Düsseldorf, Germany and Nous Étions play post-metal and sludge influenced screamo from Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The mood of the record is quite ethereal and a little darker than their previous songs and the sound of the split is dynamic and properly heavy, I think. Excellent stuff for Fans of Amber, Sed Non Satiata, Le pre ou je suis mort, etc.!

Listen and Download for free here:
http://aldorainedoom.bandcamp.com/album/split-w-nous-tions

We'll send every pre-ordered copy out after arrival of the vinyl - this should be mid/end of June! You don't have to wait until August 2nd!

Info: The split record of a screamo/emo band Trachimbrod and a shoegazer/emo band Sore Eyelids featuring members of Suis La Lune, Mixtapes and Cellmates, New Decade, Years Passing from Stockholm, Sweden. Record includes each 2 brand new tracks that recorded in February/March 2013. 12" LP designed by Yosuke Fujimura/Tokyo Jupiter Records.

Tracklist:

Trachimbrod
1. I am Jack’s Wasted Life
2. Erect, Eyes Closed

Sore Eyelids
3. Next To Nothing
4. Dissolve

name: TRACHIMBROD - A Collection Of Hidden Sketches 12" LP
description:
Artist: Trachimbrod
Title: A Collection Of Hidden Sketches
Format: 12" LP / purple vinyl / with insert / alternate cover
Edition: 300 copies
Catalogue Number: TLE 008
Release Date: 20th July 2012
Artwork by: Studio Weiß

***

3 different Versions:
a) standard - just LP - 11€
b) standard LP + tote bag - 13€
c) standard LP + tote bag + CD - 20€

***

Listen:
http://ihearttruelove.bandcamp.com/track/salvation

http://youtu.be/Gvv1fv5Ho-I

***

Trachimbrod (former Come Across Trachimbrod) is a swedish screamo/postrock band who despite of it's young age all ready has reached thousands of ears around the world. Listeners describe the music with lines as "Melodic and beautiful, even in the rougher moments", "The most emotional anthem in the screamo scene" and "Inexpressible atmosphere, excellent catchy melodies plus brilliant vocals make it a true masterpiece".

The five guys started out 2008 in a small town called Jönköping and just one year later their name was international known. In the summer of 2009 "Tokyo Jupiter Records" released Trachimbrod's four piece demo named "Eclarion", and later that year the full lenght EP "Eating People is Easy" was available by the same label.

This summer will though be the band's big break out! The earlier namned japanese label "Tokyo Jupiter Records" will on the 6th of June release the first full lenght album "A Collection of Hidden Sketches" on CD. On the 20th of July the tracks will be given out on both vinyl and cassette. "Truelove Entertainment" from Germany and the russian "Sad Songs Records" stand behind these. With this coming the band also will be doing their first european tour, with start on the 20th of July.

With "A Collection of Hidden Sketches" Trachimbrod shows a new, more dirty sound. The earlier instrumental, postrock influenced tunes are exchanged with harder, more desperate onced focused on the vocals. Although, the music still contains it's unique melodies and explosions. Trachimbrod comes with surprises and will never leave a listener untouched.

Tracklist:
1. Us Without Self Control
2. Salvation
3. Through Walls, Floors And More
4. Mediocrity
5. Lost In Direction With A Dead Eye
6. No More Peaceful Mind
7. Don't Trust Experts
8. Growth
9. Rescue Me From Silence

TRUELOVE ENTERTAINMENT: 
http://ihearttruelove.com/ 
http://www.facebook.com/IHeartTruelove
http://www.youtube.com/user/ihearttruelove
http://ihearttruelove.bandcamp.com/
http://ihearttruelove.bigcartel.com/

name: Syndrome - Floating Veins 12" LP (lim. 300)
description:
ConSouling Sounds and Truelove Entertainment decided to join forces in order to release this wonderful debut title on vinyl. This medium gives the sound the spectrum it deserves. Don't miss out on this as it is strictly limited to 300 copies.

Description:
It is with great pride we bring you "Floating Veins", the debut album of Syndrome, the lastest moniker under which Mathieu Vandekerckhove (Amenra, Kingdom, Sembler Deah) operates. Opposed to the emotional and violent outpour that Amenra delivers, Syndrome explores the very boundaries of introspective music. Prepare to be taken on a narrative musical journey through five acts each painting a different picture but trancending into one dramatic moment where everything seems to fall into place perfectly. While the ambient soundscapes and the erie droning riffs are the blood, the apocalyptic drums and beats are the pulse. The tides stow the listener right into the roaring heart of Syndrome. Until it stops.

LAST COPIES!

TRUELOVE ENTERTAINMENT: 
http://ihearttruelove.com/ 
http://www.facebook.com/IHeartTruelove
http://www.youtube.com/user/ihearttruelove
http://ihearttruelove.bandcamp.com/
http://ihearttruelove.bigcartel.com/

name: OUR CEASING VOICE - THAT DAY LAST NOVEMBER 12" LP
description:
Yeah! The sophomore album "That Day Last November" by OUR CEASING VOICE. To be released Jan. 18th. 

Incorporating guest appearances by American singer-songwriter Matthew Ryan, as well as the typical, deep and almost dying vocals of Reinhard Obermeir, lead to tighter song structures while maintaining Our Ceasing Voices full cinematic strengths. Thus, their new album will make sure sure you wont be able to escape your memory. Of everything that happened on that day last November.

Tracklist:
01. Afterglow
02. Until Your Chest Explodes
03. One Of These Nights
04. What Used To Be A Battle Song
05. The Anniversary
06. The City That Once Had A Name
07. Jaded
08. Like Wildfire

Black Vinyl limited to 400.
Clear Vinyl limited to 100.

Expect a mixture of piano parts, guitar walls and explosionesc sections. Atmospheric rock at it's very best with guarantee for gooseflesh!

name: Our Ceasing Voice & Satory Split 7" EP (white)
description:
Combining the thrilling intensity of Post-Rock/
Ambient quartett Our Ceasing Voice and the raw power of Vienna's Post-Metal
pioneers Satory, this split 7" marks a blood-tingling release that proves
the Austrian bands' talents by opening the door to a world full of melancholy
and despair.

a hard blow to the mind. striking November 1st 2011

Side A: Our Ceasing Voice - For Darkness Fears The
Light

Side B: Satory - The Translator

digital version includes unreleased 3 bonus tracks.
7" vinyl comes with a free download code.

name: TRACHIMBROD - A Collection Of Hidden Sketches CD JPN Import
description:
Artist: Trachimbrod
Title: A Collection Of Hidden Sketches
Format: Digi-CD
Edition: 300 copies
Catalogue Number: TJP-024
Release Date: 06.06.2012
Price: ￥1,470 (tax-in)
Label: Tokyo Jupiter Records Japan

Info: The first full-length of a screamo/post-rock band Trachimbrod a.k.a. Come Across Trachimbrod from Sweden. CD includes 9 tracks + 2 exclusive bonus remixes by Pmtoyou and Woodchucker. CD designed by Studio Weiss.

Trachimbrod (former Come Across Trachimbrod) is a swedish screamo/postrock band who despite of it's young age all ready has reached thousands of ears around the world. Listeners describe the music with lines as "Melodic and beautiful, even in the rougher moments", "The most emotional anthem in the screamo scene" and "Inexpressible atmosphere, excellent catchy melodies plus brilliant vocals make it a true masterpiece".

The five guys started out 2008 in a small town called Jönköping and just one year later their name was international known. In the summer of 2009 "Tokyo Jupiter Records" released Trachimbrod's four piece demo named "Eclarion", and later that year the full lenght EP "Eating People is Easy" was available by the same label.

This summer will though be the band's big break out! The earlier namned japanese label "Tokyo Jupiter Records" will on the 6th of June release the first full lenght album "A Collection of Hidden Sketches" on CD. On the 20th of July the tracks will be given out on both vinyl and cassette. "Truelove Entertainment" from Germany and the russian "Sad Songs Records" stand behind these. With this coming the band also will be doing their first european tour, with start on the 20th of July.

With "A Collection of Hidden Sketches" Trachimbrod shows a new, more dirty sound. The earlier instrumental, postrock influenced tunes are exchanged with harder, more desperate onced focused on the vocals. Although, the music still contains it's unique melodies and explosions. Trachimbrod comes with surprises and will never leave a listener untouched.

Tracklist:
1. Us Without Self Control
2. Salvation
3. Through Walls, Floors And More
4. Mediocrity
5. Lost In Direction With A Dead Eye
6. No More Peaceful Mind
7. Don't Trust Experts
8. Growth
9. Rescue Me From Silence
10. Lost In Direction With A Dead Eye (Remix by Pmtoyou) *
11. Growth (Remix by Woodchucker) *
* bonus track

http://www.youtube.com/user/ihearttruelove
http://ihearttruelove.bandcamp.com/

name: Gordon´s Tsunami Week - "We See The Reflections Of Ourselves In The Frames We Look At" Digi CD
description:
We proclaim this Album in every newsletter! Now it´s time!

If you ask me GTW presenting the best German Post Rock/Post Metal album since Long Distance Calling! This CD gives me the creeps, again again and again!

Expect fine decent violin lines, double bass passages, dreamy melodies and a wonderful sound of guitars!

I would describe GTW as a mixture of GY!YBE, Explosions In The Sky and Long Distance Calling!

The full coloured Digipak is limited to 500 copies.

Out Now!
